00052         @Test
00053         public void testMetaModelRegistration() {               
00054                 String nsURI = modelManager.getNsURI();
00055                 Registry globalRegistry = EPackage.Registry.INSTANCE; 
00056                 EPackage ePkg = globalRegistry.getEPackage( nsURI );
00057 
00058                 // This asserts that the package has been registered
00059                 // to the global EMF registry, in standalone mode.
00060                 assertTrue(ePkg.getName().equalsIgnoreCase( ePkgName ));

00071                         modelManager.loadIt();
00072                         modelManager.validateIt();
00073                 }
00074                 catch (InvalidModelException e) {
00075                         java.lang.System.out.println( e.getMessage() );
00076                         fail("Invalid Model, see stdout for details.");
00077                 }

00081         public void testGetTopElement() throws InvalidModelException {
00082                 modelManager.loadIt();
00083                 EObject top = modelManager.getTopElement();

00088         @Test
00089         public void testNewModel() throws InvalidModelException {
00090                 this.createFile_deleteMe_WithAmodelNamed("Testy");
00091                 Model newModel = this.loadItandGetModelElement();
00092                 assertTrue( newModel.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("Testy"));
00093         }
00094 
00095         protected Model loadItandGetModelElement() throws InvalidModelException {
00096                 SimulinkModelManager aManager = new SimulinkModelManager(deleteMe);
00097                 aManager.loadIt();
00098                 Model newModel = (Model) aManager.getTopElement();
00099                 return newModel;
00100         }
00101         
00102         protected void createFile_deleteMe_WithAmodelNamed(String modelName) {
00103                 SimulinkModelManager newModel = new SimulinkModelManager(deleteMe);
00104                 SimulinkFactory factory = newModel.getFactory();
00105                 Model model = factory.createModel();
00106                 model.setName("Testy");
00107                 newModel.setTopElement( model );
00108                 try {
00109                         newModel.saveIt();
00110                 } catch (Exception e) {
00111                         e.printStackTrace();
00112                         fail(String.format("Could not save to file: %s", deleteMe));
00113                 }               
00114         }
00115 }
